turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Glen Smith (discus thrower).
turn.1: What is the discus thrower Glen Smith's biography?
turn.2: Glen Smith (discus thrower) Glen Ernest Smith (born 21 May 1972) is a male retired English discus thrower.
turn.4: Smith was a two-time competitor at the World Championships in Athletics (1997 and 1999).
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: He represented England, at the 1994 Commonwealth Games in Victoria, British Columbia, Canada.
turn.8: and represented England, at the 1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
turn.10: A third consecutive appearance at the Games ensued at the 2002 Commonwealth Games.
turn.12: His personal best throw is 65.11 metres, achieved in July 1999 in Barking.
